refnamediv.refpurpose: Loads parameter banks to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vstprogset sets one of the programs in an .fxb bank.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: instance - the number which identifies the plugin, to be passed to other vst4cs opcodes.
kprogram - the number of the program to set.
